metadata.description:
As comfortable as we can get that hasn’t happened to us yet... 

"I had been writing a lot during covid lockdown.  After a nice morning surf session I came back to the studio and came up with two parts on the TonePad app on my iPhone.  Thought it was pretty cool and added some drum loops, some Moog Taurus basslines and some synth bass. Sent it to Bayliss asking if he could add anything or work his magic.  He did." 

- Ryan Stasik

"During the lockdown we were sending musical ideas back and forth. Ryan sent his demo and I immediately knew there was real potential. I recorded some vocals over his parts and then a few months later I was messing around with what is now the chorus section.  Once I spliced the two together I knew that we had just finished a new song, one that doesn’t sound like anything else we were working on at that time."

- Brendan Bayliss

lyrics.text:
I’ll take the stairs when I leave
Next time I won’t forget the key
Now don’t compare anything
If what I said I didn’t mean

What I can’t repair I won’t bring
And I won’t sell it on the street
And I wanna believe that the moment we tried would be
But I realize that the storyline’s finite 

Turn it on before you go and you don’t have to let them know
There’s nobody I can tell who seems to take this very well
As comfortable as we can get that hasn’t happened to us yet
There's no subscribing to a scene, who has the courage or the teeth

If anyone can stare at anything 
I can’t tell you what to keep
But I’ll take good care of everything
What was broken I won’t critique

Because then it won’t be fair, pulling strings
And only get one chance to speak

And I wanna believe
That the moment relied on me

Turn it on before you go and you don’t have to let them know
There’s nobody I can tell who seems to take this very well
As comfortable as we can get that hasn’t happened to us yet
There's no subscribing to a scene, who has the courage or the teeth

When I don’t believe in me
And I realize that the story might line up wide right

metadata.name: Staircase #1
metadata.title: Staircase
